response.original_title: Mugshots: Sandy Murphy - Death of a Casino King
response.overview: Sandy Murphy was a gambler from LA who went broke gambling in Ted Binion's Vegas hotel. But after meeting, they fell in love - until Ted mysteriously turned up dead and Sandy was charged with his murder. Found guilty, Sandy appealed and won. A free woman, Sandy Murphy speaks exclusively in this documentary.
response.title: Mugshots: Sandy Murphy - Death of a Casino King
